title: $RLY Grant - Josh Katz Music Agency
body:
Proposal
Provide the following $RLY grants to Josh Katz’s new music agency from the Creator, Brand and Community Partnerships pool:

-Initial Grant: 250k $RLY 
-Scaling Grant: Additional $RLY grant contingent on completion of fundraise.  $RLY grant amounts to 50% of the USD value of fundraise, up to a max of $250k worth of $RLY. 

The initial grant represents “seed funding” for his new agency and would have no vesting, and the scaling grant would have 12-month vesting.  

Purpose
As an existing Rally advisor for the music vertical, Josh successfully brought on Portugal. The Man and helped guide them towards a successful launch. He is all-in on social tokens and wants to start an agency specifically geared towards bringing big name musicians onto Rally.  More on Josh, including a video explanation from him, in this Discourse thread: https://forum.rally.io/t/rly-grant-structure-for-businesses-building-atop-rally/188

In this grant structure, the Initial Grant is meant to provide a relatively small amount of “seed funding” to help Josh get his agency off the ground and kick off a fundraise.  The larger Scaling Grant is contingent upon a successful fundraise for his agency and has a max cap. 

This is a simple structure that also aligns incentives in a way that puts skin in the game for both the Rally community and Josh. 

A Yes vote for this proposal would approve a 250k $RLY grant to Josh Katz’s agency from the Creator, Brand and Community Partnerships pool with no vesting terms, and also authorize a future grant should conditions be met.  

A No vote for this proposal would result in no change.
author: 0x893D2E776F21143354123241bC1DC237C47BC3fC
